goals__remit: The Association for Natural Medicine in Europe e. V. is a coalition of organizations, manufacturers, foundations, professionals of health prevention and individuals in Europe who are active in the areas of naturopathy, traditional medicine, non-conventional medicine, complementary methods and alternative medicine as well as in health literacy and salutogenesis for human beings and animals. The mentioned units have been groped under the acronym “CAM”. It is used for coordination and common safeguarding of interests of CAM in the European and national policy
industry_forums:

50-years of EU-Pharma-legislation
